last_episode_to_air.name: Distant Drumming (TV Movie)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Teevee pushes Michelle to accept the idea of an aboriginal police force, with former RCMP member Marjorie Sebastian supporting him and his former cellmate Matthew Fowler as a test case for community rehabilitation. But when a tourist is killed, suspicion falls on Matthew and on a Lynx River  resident who may have had a longstanding grudge against the victim.

name: North of 60
overview: North of 60 is a mid-1990s Canadian television series depicting life in the sub-Arctic northern boreal forest. It first aired on CBC Television in 1992 and was syndicated around the world. It is set in the fictional community of Lynx River, a primarily Native-run town depicted as being in the Dehcho Region, Northwest Territories. Most of the characters were Dene. Some non-native characters had important roles: the restaurant/motel owner, the band manager, the nurse and the town's main RCMP officer. The show explored themes of Native poverty, alcoholism, cultural preservation and conflict over land settlements and natural resource exploitation. Originally somewhat light-hearted, it quickly became a more dramatic and ponderous series.

episodes.overview: After his marriage failed and his partner's death, Eric Olssen moved from Vancouver into Lynnx River to clear his mind and think about everything...

episodes.name: A Different Drummer
episodes.overview: Eric has some problems with Albert Golo and he wants to put him away from the business. Rosie Deela sues her husband Leon for assaulting, where Eric get a little too much involved.

episodes.overview: Al Bishop arrives in Lynx River and he has a big wish to get back together with Sara. A couple of supervisors have plans for a new highway.

episodes.overview: Michelle's hous burns down and Teevee Tenia is the head suspect. Eric moves into Sarah's apartment. He still need to think about job offer that he got in Vacouver when he was looking for missing Teevee.

episodes.overview: Teevee gets into another fight with Bertha. Ellen needs somebody to help her to keep the treatment center opened and Andrew One Sky turns out to be just the write personâ€¦

Her grandmother tells her that she would be great if she could take over her properties, but with some strings attached.

Ellen Kenidi, after a lot of time, decides to leave Lynx River with Elijah after ealising some stuffs about Peter. Charlie gets a new foster home, but he does not wants to go thereâ€¦

Albert decides to punish Joe because he's helping Sarah, so he sabotages some of his traps. Brian and Rosemary are finally happy because they found s son they can adopt.

episodes.overview: Sarah gets a job offer from Peter at health center. Andrew starts worring about the new job of his that keeps him away from Michelle and Charlieâ€¦

episodes.overview: After getting a job for his portable sawmill, Teevee hires Joey Small Boat to help him around the sawmill. Brian, after he visits Sarah, has been attacked. Next day Joey Small Boat dissapears alsoâ€¦

episodes.name: Simple Sufferings
episodes.overview: Now, when Leon is absent, Rosie spends even more time with Gerry. Lois is worried about Elsie's metal health when she has premonitions about Teevee in  danger. Lois has plans to become a lay minister, but there are some obstacles on his wayâ€¦

episodes.name: A Shimmer of Scales
episodes.overview: Brian tries to sabotage Andrew's trip business. Later he finds contraband animal parts what makes his task even more easier. An loan officer comes to Lynx River for some valuable informationsâ€¦

episodes.name: Suspicious Minds
episodes.overview: Elsie Tsa Che has plans to stop Sylvies appoitment as a new schoolteacher. Bertha and Teevee get into another new fight. Michelle is investigating Brian's strange actingâ€¦

episodes.overview: Michelle's notebook has been stolen and she does everything so she could find it and resolve the case between Brian and Brenda. Harris finsa out that Peter went away to get a deal with gas company. Brian appears an Lynx River totally on drugsâ€¦

episodes.overview: Lois has some news for Harris that makes him have a very strong reaction. Betty returns to Lynx River with a plan to re-open the treatment center and to give Sarah a job offer. Michelle continues on with serch for Brian who is still missingâ€¦

episodes.name: Hunting in the Dark
episodes.overview: Michelle goes to Vancouver so she could find out from Brenda where is Brian. Sarah makes a housewarming party and Albert realises some stuffs about his and Sarah's lifeâ€¦

episodes.name: The Higher Law
episodes.overview: After Albert's house burns down Michelle has a new task to find out who burned down the house and where is Albert.Michelle gets a visit from ins. Cormier who tells her that she may become a corporal, but there are some strings attachedâ€¦

episodes.name: The Road
episodes.overview: Sarah is concinced that she sees Albert and it scares her. Const. James Harper thinks that Michelle is leaving the force, but later Michelle returns back to Lynx River, so he is taken aback.

episodes.name: Cold
episodes.overview: Brenda returns back to Lynx River and has a big hope to stay with Bertha and Teevee. Teevee has some job to do with clearing the trees and he gets into a little troubleâ€¦

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: Teevee has some business to do with Gerry and he tries to convince him to invest in a possibly hot stock. Peter brings one of his old friends, Harry Dobbs to take control of town's cash flow. Joe Gomba goes to hospital to check himself upâ€¦

episodes.name: Sleeping Dogs
episodes.overview: A Revenue Canada agent shows up at lynx River and Peter tries to avoid him. Michelle is very slow with arresting Albert Golo what gets Joe, Nathan and James Harper frustratedâ€¦

episodes.name: Love Hurts
episodes.overview: James Harper gets a visit from his father, Jack Harper who tries to pressure Michelle so she would give James a transfer and also gives peter a great offer. Harris' head is full with preparations for his baby's arrival.

episodes.name: Peter & The Wolf
episodes.overview: Sarah gets little more closer with Martin Walker. In the meantime, Peter is all stressed because of the upcoming visit from legislative race. Leon gets an unxepected visit from someoneâ€¦

episodes.name: Oil & Water
episodes.overview: Elsie Tsa Che has a plan for new water system and there she becomes involved with Teevee who also has some plans of his with the bad council. Leon tries to be back closer with Rosie. Nathan dissapears againâ€¦

episodes.name: If I Have Been Untrue
episodes.overview: Harper presurres Michelle again so shww would give him a transfer. He also tries trick Teevee and Nathan into a location of the rifle where Albert may be murderedâ€¦

episodes.name: Heroes (For One Day)
episodes.overview: After Michelle has been shot, inspector Cormier shows up at Lynx River to resolve that mystery. He has some suspicions about Harper because he was not with Michelle when the whole thing happened. Tevee has some business with the oil company again and finds out that Joe Gome and some other people may be displaced. As the whole thing revolves, Teevee finally finds out who is the big Lynx River Resources boss. Sarah wants to tell Nathan Golo that her unborn baby is hisâ€¦

episodes.name: The Smell of Violets
episodes.overview: James Harper and Inspector Cormier are still triing to find out who was Michelle's attcker. Teevee dissapers what giuves them even more work to do. Gerry volunteers to be Jesse's godfatherâ€¦

episodes.name: A Sparrow Falls
episodes.overview: The mysterious person who killed Michelle is still unknown, and Teevee is still missing. Albert is pressured to keep his promise for a new water sistem after he finds out that a health inspector is threating Gerry to close his restaurant because of contamination. Lois goes through some hard time because Teevee's missingâ€¦

episodes.name: I Shall Not Want
episodes.overview: Michelle returns back home and Charlie is happy but in the same time sad because Michelle does not wants to quit her dangerous job. Harris researched the town to find a perfect person that will perform a ceremony that would help Lois. Michelle's mysterious shooter is still unknown.

episodes.name: Borrowed Time
episodes.overview: Sarah finds out the reason why Albert does not wants to have an important operation. Teevee gets sidetracked while he's hiking to his father's cabin. Gerry Kisilenko receives a letter that might change his future forever. Albert asks Joe Gomba for a big favourâ€¦

episodes.name: In the Blue Ground (TV Movie)
episodes.overview: A geologist looking for diamonds on band land far from town is murdered, and a piece of evidence brings Michelle to a stunning realization about the possible perpetrator. When Sarah is abducted from a camp not far from the murder, Michelle, James, and Joe go deep into the bush to rescue her. Will they succeed? And even if they do, will that be the end of her kidnapper's long held resentments?

episodes.name: Trial by Fire (TV Movie)
episodes.overview: The dedication of the Noda Deh Lodge--Peter and Teevee's grand plan to bring more tourism to Lynx River--is marred by a late night fire and a body. James begins to suspect Peter, who had  been seen arguing with the dead man not long before the fire. Although Michelle wants to believe in her brother's innocence, his obvious lying about certain aspects of the incident makes it hard for her to do so. Adding to the tension --and the plausibility of a coverup-- is the fact that Peter is trying to become premier of the Northwest Territories. When James and Michelle travel to Yellowknife to investigate the dead man's work for the provincial legislature, hey begin to unravel a complicated web of political wheeling and dealing. But what--and whom--will they find at the center?

episodes.name: Dream Storm (TV Movie)
episodes.overview: Strange and disturbing things are happening in Lynx River. As Michelle and James try to determine the cause of death of a body found in the river, Michelle and Teevee are having frightening dreams, and many of the town's children are struck by a mysterious illness. In the midst of all this, Teevee tries to close a deal for a new gas pipeline. Then an unexpected figure returns to Lynx River. Is he there to offer a warning, a solution, or both?

episodes.name: Another Country (TV Movie)
episodes.overview: On a trip to Calgary to negotiate a hydroelectric deal, Teevee is arrested for the murder of a young native woman. As he attempts to cope with the hostile environment of the jail, Michelle tries to find out what really happened a quest that reaches its climax back in Lynx River.

episodes.name: Distant Drumming (TV Movie)
episodes.overview: Teevee pushes Michelle to accept the idea of an aboriginal police force, with former RCMP member Marjorie Sebastian supporting him and his former cellmate Matthew Fowler as a test case for community rehabilitation. But when a tourist is killed, suspicion falls on Matthew and on a Lynx River  resident who may have had a longstanding grudge against the victim.
